👉🏼RP: @just_mi_in_christ
•
Watch til the end! 
FLEE FROM FORNICATION‼️ ———————————————————————— Sex was created by God, between a man and a woman, a husband and a wife. Any sex outside of the bonds of marriage between a man and a woman is sinful in God’s eyes. ————————————————————————
Fornication is any kind of sexual activity outside of marriage or between people that are not married. ———————————————————————— 1 Corinthians 6:18-20 
Flee from sexual immorality. All other sins a person commits are outside the body, but whoever sins sexually, sins against their own body. 
Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 
you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your bodies
